overview: The first complete animation produced by Sheila Graber and set in her native South Shields. The film follows the adventures of a small boy and his cat as they walk through the snowy landscape, chase a Robin down onto the River Tyne and meet Father Christmas.  The character of the boy is based upon Sheilaâ€™s nephew Nigel and the cat is based upon her own cat Whitey.
title: The Boy and the Cat
